---
title: Tibialis Posterior Tendinitis
---

Inflammation of the tendon of the [Tibialis Posterior muscle]({{< var ref-tibialis-posterior.path >}}).



Treatment plan

- STM to tendon and muscle belly
- Cupping to tendon and muscle belly 
    - with stretching or activation
- ART
- [PAILS/RAILS]({{< var ref-tibialis-posterior.pails-rails >}})
